resources.string: You are now in unleashed mode!
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
View or change how the \'cLock\' widget will be displayed.
View or change how the clock of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the weather of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the calendar of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
Change hosts file to disable ads
Updating hosts file failed. Please try again.
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
The time between wifi scans when no stored access points are available
Windows Manager\'s max events per second
This is a runtime value that controls the number of events the system will allow in a second
The amount of time from when the system registers an incoming phone call until the ringer
This controls the size of the cache the Dalvik VM has access to
We should look because knowing is half the battle
*WARNING* if you change this value it will add the needed values to your build.prop if they are not already present
When you are in-call screen is off when the device moves away from your face this delay value controls how long before screen turns on
This is astetic and doesn\'t improve the system
Modify the buffer-size for better performance
Enable hardware acceleration where the GPU controls the UI instead of the CPU

Unfortunately we are not wizards!

So if you find a bug with any of these settings, please open up a ticket on Jira or contact a DU developer with the following.

1. Logcat or Last_Kmsg
2. Kernel and Mods used
3. Useful information

If you fail to report something, do not expect things to be fixed. Remember, we are not wizards so we do miss things.
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Volume keys control media volume rather than notifications
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Enable various network traffic options in statusbar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Select and preview system toast animation
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Display extra info for cpu, display, etc
Show notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Never show ongoing notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Show clear all button on recents panel
Press on color below to apply
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Notification text animation in the statusbar
Shows you the partition information for the device
Overrides the default display density (0 to disable, requires a reboot)
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Pressing the home button will wake your device
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Disable quick settings on secure lockscreen

Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
This option will disable the power menu only on secure lock screens
Enable or disable the Google search bar in the recents menu
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks

Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Show in battery statistics unaccounted and over-counted usage.
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.

Heads up notification will show until it is dismissed
